text: La Chapelle-Yvon is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Valorbiquet.Arrêté préfectoral 9 December 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: La Chapelle-Yvon
